title: Enhancing Professional Visual Literacy for Pre-Service Teachers: Video Analysis-Based Small Group Teaching Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of elementary education theories, no practical experience in classroom teaching environments
context.additional_context: Aims to improve elementary social studies lessons for current professionals, conducting real-time collaborative learning via Zoom and LMS in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three core instructional behaviors by analyzing small-group class videos.
Learners can interpret problems occurring in class situations and propose improvements using signaling cues and self-explanation prompts.
Learners can complete instructional design projects applying professional visual techniques based on peer feedback and instructor-guided questions.

resources: Small-group instruction video clips (10 clips, 5 minutes each)
Google Jamboard or Miro collaborative boards

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
